properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 8:57PM PST until February 14 at 9:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY
